title: Elden Ring’s New Update Makes The DLC Easier - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.26.24
description:
Go to kindafunny.com/store to get our limited time Pride Collection! A portion of the sales will be donated to Queer LifeSpace and Denver based Center on Colfax!

Tim and Blesing talk about the Elden Ring DLC Shadow of The Erdtree being patched to make it easier, Elden Ring adaptation ideas, and Dead Rising rising from the dead.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:36 - Housekeeping
 - Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
     - Gamescast is our Nintendo World Championships NES Preview
     - The STREAM is Warzone with the Jabroni Boys
 - If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
     - You can get today’s Gregway.
     - And you can get Elektra In Review this afternoon, and tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.
           -   The Roper Report   -
00:08:22 - ‘Elden Ring: Shadow Of The Erdtree’ Patch Buffs Players After Difficulty Complaints
00:23:57 - From Software says ‘there’s interest’ in an Elden Ring adaptation
00:37:57 - Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster has been announced
00:43:31 - Those Assassin’s Creed, Resident Evil and Death Stranding ports to mobile have bombed
00:51:15 - El Paso, Elsewhere devs’ announce new game, “Clickolding”
00:55:14 - Wee News!
00:55:55 - You‘re Wrong
